marketplaces.name: clawd-presence
marketplaces.description: Discord Rich Presence for Claude Code (Windows)

files.README.md:
# Clawd Presence (Claude Code -> Discord Rich Presence)

Windows-only helper that shows Claude Code activity in Discord Rich Presence. It runs a small background daemon that applies updates and keeps Discord in sync while you work.

## Requirements

- Windows 10/11
- Discord Desktop client running
- Claude Code with hooks enabled
- Git (optional, for repo/branch display)

## Quick start

```powershell
# from repo root
.\install.ps1
```

The installer builds the helper (if Go is available), writes config (if you enter a Client ID), and installs/updates the plugin. If a manual install exists, it removes the old `clawd-presence` folder first.

## How it works (short)

Claude Code hooks invoke `dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1`. The script writes the desired presence state and a background daemon applies it to Discord. On session end, the daemon clears or idles your presence based on config.

## Usage

- Presence updates automatically on session start, prompts, tool runs, failures, and session end.
- To change what appears, edit the config file (see below).
- To refresh or update the plugin, re-run `install.ps1`.

## Configuration

Global config path:

- `%APPDATA%\ClawdPresence\config.json`

Example:

```json
{
  "discord": {
    "clientId": "YOUR_CLIENT_ID",
    "largeImageKey": "clawd",
    "largeImageText": "Claude Code",
    "smallImageKey": "terminal",
    "smallImageText": "Windows"
  },
  "privacy": {
    "showRepo": true,
    "showBranch": true,
    "showToolName": true
  },
  "behavior": {
    "onSessionEnd": "clear",
    "updateDebounceMs": 500
  }
}
```

Optional (no file): set `CLAWD_PRESENCE_CLIENT_ID` or `DISCORD_CLIENT_ID` in your environment. If no Client ID is configured, the helper uses a shared default application ID.

Project override:

- `<repo>\.claude\presence.json` (same schema as global config)

## Update / reinstall

```powershell
.\install.ps1
```

If you use a manual install, also pass `-PluginDir` to your plugins folder. The script removes any existing `clawd-presence` directory before reinstalling.

## Manual install (no marketplace)

Use this when the Claude CLI is unavailable or marketplace install fails.

1. Build (optional but recommended):

```powershell
go build -o dist\windows\clawd-presence.exe .\cmd\clawd-presence
```

2. Install the plugin folder:

```powershell
# Example: plugins directory is %USERPROFILE%\.claude\plugins
.\install.ps1 -PluginDir "$env:USERPROFILE\.claude\plugins" -Mode Junction
```

3. Restart Claude Code.

## Manual hook setup (no plugin)

Add these commands to your `.claude/settings.json` hooks if you want to wire hooks by hand:

```json
{
  "hooks": {
    "SessionStart": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }],
    "UserPromptSubmit": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }],
    "PreToolUse": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }],
    "PostToolUseFailure": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }],
    "Stop": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }],
    "SessionEnd": [{
      "matcher": "*",
      "hooks": [{
        "type": "command",
        "command": "powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:/path/to/dist/windows/claude-hooks/presence.ps1",
        "timeout": 5
      }]
    }]
  }
}
```

## Manual fixes / troubleshooting

- Presence not showing: ensure Discord desktop app is running and you provided a valid Client ID.
- Hooks not firing: confirm the hook command path points to the correct `presence.ps1` file.
- Stale presence: run `dist/windows/clawd-presence.exe clear` or restart Claude Code.
- Plugin stuck: re-run `install.ps1` to reinstall and refresh the plugin files.

## Diagnostics

```powershell
.\dist\windows\clawd-presence.exe diagnose
```

## Files & locations

- Global config: `%APPDATA%\ClawdPresence\config.json`
- Project override: `<repo>\.claude\presence.json`
- State file: `%LOCALAPPDATA%\ClawdPresence\state.json`
- Logs: `%LOCALAPPDATA%\ClawdPresence\logs\YYYY-MM-DD.log`

plugins.name: clawd-presence
plugins.description: Show your Claude Code session on Discord
